example.eg: With the rise of internet banking, cheques are being phased out as a form of payment.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逐步淘汰, 使...逐步停止, 逐步结束

example.eg: The airline is phasing this plane out of its fleet.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 把...从...中去除，把...从...中逐步废除

example.eg: The 1980s saw the phase-out of asbestos in favour of safer materials.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 逐步淘汰, 逐步取消

example.eg: His manner of speech seemed completely out phase with his age.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不协调地, 不同位地, 不同步地
不协调的, 不同位的, 不同步的
